Key Match Events: The Jazz lost to the Mavericks 110-102 and then to Sacramento 113-96 at home, extending their losing streak
Pre-Game Insights: Utah coach Will Hardy mentioned that the team needs to pick each other up after the injury of Taylor Hendricks
Post-Match Reflections: Utah coach Will Hardy said that the team has to recalibrate and find a way to fill the void left by Hendricks' injury
Miscellaneous Highlights: Taylor Hendricks suffered a gruesome injury breaking his right fibula and dislocating his ankle
Utah guard Keyonte George mentioned how Hendricks willingly gave up offensive opportunities to use his energy on the defensive end
Others: Lauri Markkanen left the game at halftime with back spasms but it isn't expected to be serious
